subject: Class loading problem
msgSnippet: Followed the approach mentioned in http://www.javaworld.com/javaworld/jw-05-2000/jw-0526-testinfect- p2.html. Unable to access the Junit test cases that are
messageBody:
Followed the approach mentioned in
http://www.javaworld.com/javaworld/jw-05-2000/jw-0526-testinfect-
p2.html.

Unable to access the Junit test cases that are present in EJB Module.
It's always failing while loading the class i.e., Class.forName. But If
I copy the same test case class into web module, it's doing good.

Is there any problem in the approach. Any suggestions are helpful.
Thanks in advance.
